jzombies

Interface Connection

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Agent, Attacker, Defender, User

    public interface Connection
    This is an interface that helps to make the connection between the agents.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connect(Agent agent)
      This function will connect the source agent to defender.
      void receive(Request request)
      This function will receive the response from the defender.
      void send(Request request)
      This function will send the request from the sender agent to defender.
